Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies signed Bryce Harper in 2019 with the promise of consistent contention. They reached the World Series last year and the NLCS this year.
Key Match Events: Bryce Harper was 0-for-4 with a strikeout in a 4-2 Game 7 NLCS loss to the Arizona Diamondbacks Tuesday.
Post-Match Reflections: Bryce Harper expressed disappointment but promised, 'Weâ€™ll be back.' He praised the Phillies' management for their commitment to providing the team with the best opportunity to win.
Others: The Phillies' offseason is about an hour old, and Harper's declaration that the team will return to the postseason for a third consecutive year was built on his belief in the team's management.
